name: reactive-model
description: A library for data flow components.

scripts.build: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; browserify index.js -s ReactiveModel | tee reactive-model-v$VERSION.js | uglifyjs -cm > reactive-model-v$VERSION.min.js; sed -i -e "s/v[0-9]*\.[0-9]*\.[0-9]*/v$VERSION/g" README.md

author: Curran Kelleher
